testimonials.title: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers have to say about their Nuvora experience.

customer1.name: John D.
customer1.quote: The quality of furniture exceeded my expectations. The delivery was prompt and the assembly was a breeze. Highly recommended!

customer2.name: Amanda S.
customer2.quote: I've purchased multiple items from Nuvora and each one has been exceptional. Their customer service is outstanding!

customer3.name: Michael R.
customer3.quote: The modern design of their furniture perfectly matches my home's aesthetic. I get compliments from every guest!

aboutSection.title: Who We Are
aboutSection.description: We are a passionate team dedicated to creating innovative solutions that make a difference. Our expertise spans multiple industries, and we pride ourselves on delivering excellence in everything we do.

hero.description: We are committed to delivering excellence through innovation and teamwork.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide innovative solutions that empower businesses and individuals to succeed.

vision.title: Our Vision

values.title: Our Values
